text: The Matchbook Romance is an American emo/pop punk band formed in 1997. The band is signed to the Epitaph Records. ==Discography== The band released the following albums: ;Studio albums * Stories and Alibis (2003) * Voices (2006) ;Independent albums * Who's Listening (2001) ==References== Category:American musical groups Category:Musical groups established in 1997
title: Matchbook Romance
